name: shifter
description: Shifter is a shift calendar for places with four shifts that work two days, two nights and then have four days off.

scripts.gh: npm run clean && parcel build ./src/index.html --public-url /shifter && gh-pages -d dist
scripts.surge: npm run clean && parcel build ./src/index.html --public-url ./ && surge dist https://shifter.surge.sh
scripts.deploy: npm run surge && npm run gh
